channel.title: Telecommunications on Cisco Skills
channel.description: Recent content in Telecommunications on Cisco Skills

item.title: The Network and its Forces
item.description: communication I have started looking CCDA information and some of it is interesting, towards the beginning the material started out at design methodologies. It talked about the "forces" of a new network framework and in this post I'll focus on the business forces that make a new framework necessary. I find it interesting when looking at companies because although customer service is important to sustain a company, I also think it will and may already have depend on who embraces the technology wheel, those that do will ultimately win.

item.title: 802.11 - Legacy
item.description: Yesterday we talked about the wireless concepts (See the post Basic Wireless Concepts) in that post I mentioned the wireless standards but did not go further into detail. This post one of the five standards that make up the 802.11.
